title: WTB and finish my T206 McGraw run
author: HOF Yankees

posts.post_title: WTB and finish my T206 McGraw run
posts.post_content:
I have the Glove at hip with piedmont back so also looking for the last few, listed below

Finger in air maybe sweet cap but not picky, 

Portrait With Cap and No Cap any back, 

looking for either poor or good, and ungraded, just no writing, or stains, paper loss and no trimming, I prefer to pay with paypal so we both can have the transaction so much easier. Last please have scans of front and back,

something like or close to this 

front [URL=http://s138.photobucket.com/user/Raycroft1/media/T206McGrawfront_zps1dae4dbd.jpg.html][IMG]http://i138.photobucket.com/albums/q244/Raycroft1/T206McGrawfront_zps1dae4dbd.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://s138.photobucket.com/user/Raycroft1/media/T206McGrawback_zps639ce3b7.jpg.html][IMG]http://i138.photobucket.com/albums/q244/Raycroft1/T206McGrawback_zps639ce3b7.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
back
I am confused. You want a poor to good card that has no creasing, paperloss, writing, staining. I think you are describing a few grades above what you are looking for... Please clarify?

[quote name="Sean1125" post=1272424]I am confused. You want a poor to good card that has no creasing, paperloss, writing, staining. I think you are describing a few grades above what you are looking for... Please clarify?[/QUOTE]


basically a low end card with no qualifiers

I think what he means is you're saying you want a "poor" or "good" card, then you explain a vg/ex card.  I have all three McGraws you're looking for, in fair to good condition.  They are all available for sale, but I think showing them to you would waste both our time.  i don't have a single card in my collection that fits your criteria.

[quote name="HOF Yankees" post=1272762]basically a low end card with no qualifiers of any kind[/QUOTE]


Perhaps you can post scans of what you are looking for.  I'm with the other guys... what you describe, I don't think exists.
scan posted of my glove at hip McGraw to kinda what I am looking for. I hope I described it a little better this time.

[quote name="HOF Yankees" post=1272821]scan posted of my glove at hip McGraw to kinda what I am looking for. I hope I described it a little better this time.[/QUOTE]

The card posted is in VG-VGEX condition. Just a heads up.
looking for the potraits and finger in air, would ike to get these bought and finished, lmk if any are available
